   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Apr  9 19:44:56 2013.

   contain the root `toctree` directive.

AMPS Python Client Reference
============================

Welcome to the AMPS Python client reference. These pages provide a detailed
reference for the client library.

For an overview and introduction, see the Python Development Guide that
came with the download or the `Python developer page <http://www.crankuptheamps.com/documentation/client-apis/python/>`_ on the 60East web site.


Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   code

==================

* :ref:`modindex`
* :ref:`search`
